name: Moonless Hunter
description: The Moonless Hunter is a Medium-sized fey creature characterized by its agility, featuring notable physical traits with a strong build and dark characteristics, excelling in stealth and shadowy environments.
memorable: It uses nightmares to weaken foes while simultaneously being a capable physical threat.
goals: To instill fear and debilitate through psychological manipulation while inflicting physical harm.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other fey or creatures that thrive in darkness.
environment: Thrives in dark, shadowy environments, hindered by sunlight.
strengths: High Dexterity allows it to evade attacks effectively; possesses magical resistance.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to silvered weapons and hindered in bright light.
attacks: Uses multiattack strategy including biting and clawing, can grapple with its claws.
most_powerful_ability: Nightmare Leap that inflicts exhaustion and potential long-term madness.
senses: It exhibits exceptional stealth advantages in darkness but suffers in sunlight.
skills: Possesses moderate perception skills, facilitating average awareness.
additional_information: Resists necrotic damage and mundane weapon attacks unless silvered.
Immunity to being charmed and poisoned.
Can communicate telepathically over short distances.
Utilizes psychological tactics effectively within combat scenarios.
Can manipulate dreams to destabilize and frighten multiple targets.
test_queries: fey creature that uses psychological tactics
agile hunter that thrives in darkness
creature that inflicts nightmares on foes
moonless hunter with silver weapon vulnerability
medium fey skilled in psychological warfare
